name: Run Cola Run
description:
You have a date with Miss Cherry Cola at nine. But unfortunately, you had a bad fall and began to leak.

You had to rush for you date ASAP!

Control:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

E - Investigate or ???

made for LD38 (theme : a small world)

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/run-cola-run
